short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Acts as your personal cheerleader by providing encouragement when you move JIRA tickets to a different column.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brighten up your work day with this completely useless browser extension that cheers you on. When installed, any JIRA Cloud ticket that you move to a different column will trigger a short animation and sound effect.
